_header: Grace and manners maketh a man
Note: The first line used as motto of Winchester College

OxfChrCh152.Transcription:
Grace and good manners maketh mannBut who Louithe him that no good
                    can
OxfChrCh152.Editions:
Manly,  John Matthews,  and  Edith Rickert, eds.  
             The Text of the Canterbury Tales studied on the basis of all known
                manuscripts.
         8 vols. Chicago: University of Chicago, 1940: 1.90, 690.

BLEge2862.Transcription: Grace and good manerers maketh a manBut woe be vnto him þat no good can
BLEge2862.Note: Added to right margin by a hand of sixteenth century.
